# The Scalar constants Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this group model <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to constants referring to scalar types. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group model <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to constants referring to scalar types.

For integer types, the <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> parameter should correspond to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">llvm::IntegerType</a> instance and the returned <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> will correspond to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">llvm::ConstantInt</a>.

For floating point types, the <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> returned corresponds to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantfp">llvm::ConstantFP</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMConstInt() {#ga06540cbed28286f40b0f625bf05d0233}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMConstInt (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> IntTy, unsigned long long N, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga209de0bceb13179a973c6a45211617bd">LLVMBool</a> SignExtend)</>}>
Obtain a constant value for an integer type.

The returned value corresponds to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">llvm::ConstantInt</a>.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::ConstantInt::get()
</SectionUser>


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="IntTy">Integer type to obtain value of.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="N">The value the returned instance should refer to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SignExtend">Whether to sign extend the produced value.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMConstIntOfString() {#ga6bac11b610129646607e77d41f8d245c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMConstIntOfString (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> IntTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Text, uint8&#95;t Radix)</>}>
Obtain a constant value for an integer parsed from a string.

A similar API, LLVMConstIntOfStringAndSize is also available. If the string&#39;s length is available, it is preferred to call that function instead.

### LLVMConstRealGetDouble() {#gab5d3d570a38c53cd67c5288df7d8fdd5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>double LLVMConstRealGetDouble (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> ConstantVal, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga209de0bceb13179a973c6a45211617bd">LLVMBool</a> &#42; losesInfo)</>}>
Obtain the double value for an floating point constant value.

losesInfo indicates if some precision was lost in the conversion.

A similar API, LLVMConstRealOfStringAndSize is also available. It should be used if the input string&#39;s length is known.
